Description:

The world's most popular game goes crazy in Mario Party 8 Wii. A capricious master has invited Mario, Peah and the rest of the troops under his carnival, where we expect exciting surprises and fun minigames.
In Mario Party 8 Wii forge our way through the race on the river, smashing statues, driving race cars, etc. We play using the pointer, using it to shoot a head, drag and drop stuff. In addition, we will use the Wiimote buttons.
New game modes, 6 new boards and lots of fun minigames we experts in Mario Party 8 Wii, which can also play multiplayer games of up to 4 players
